title: I just opened up a golden Tirion Fordring :D
body:
I am so happy xD

It is a sign from the heavens that I am destined to continue to dominate and enjoy playing secret paladin :)

IT IS THE SIGN! I AM THE CHOSEN ONE! 

ALL HAIL SECRET PALADIN!


I AM THE HOLY KNIGHT!!!!!!!!!!!! I AM THE HOLY KNIGHT! I BRING JUSTICE DEMANDING RETRIBUTION!

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/hearthstone/images/b/b5/TirionFordring.gif/revision/latest?cb=20131211204119
